qas.question: Which oblast was broken up in 1943?

Who broke up the Karachays' oblast?

When was the Karachay Autonomous Oblast not ended?

context: In <a5_0><b13_0>1943<b13_0/><a5_0/>, <a0_0><b9_0>Karachay Autonomous Oblast<b9_0/><a0_0/> was dissolved by <a3_0><a4_0><b12_0>Joseph Stalin<b12_0/><a4_0/><a3_0/>, when the Karachays were exiled to <a1_0><a6_0><b10_0>Central Asia<b10_0/><a6_0/><a1_0/> for their <a7_0>alleged collaboration with the Germans<a7_0/> and territory was incorporated into <a2_0>the <a8_0><b11_0>Georgian SSR<b11_0/><a8_0/><a2_0/>.
